title: Motte Meisubeshi
description: Accountant-turned-samurai Sawamura is having a difficult time being accepted by the other samurai. Many times, store owner Yasuke has rescued him and helped heal his wounds. Now Sawamura is face-to-face with death by uncovering possible embezzlement. Will Yasuke rescue him again? Will Yasuke be the one to teach Sawamura how to correctly wield his sword?
